sect2.title: Installation of Binutils
sect2.para: The current version of Binutils in use has a bug that causes strip to remove necessary information from certain library files. This patch fixes the problem:

note.para: If you want the SBU values you could wrap the four commands in a time command like this: time { ./configure ... && ... && ... && make install; }.

sect2.para: Now prepare the linker for the Adjusting phase later on:

screen.userinput: make -C ld clean make -C ld LDFLAGS="-all-static" LIB_PATH=/tools/lib

warning.para: Do not yet remove the Binutils build and source directories. You will need them again in their current state a bit further on in this chapter.
